title: Wanted:T205 NY Giant, common, lower grade
author: donmuth

posts.post_title: Wanted:T205 NY Giant, common, lower grade
posts.post_content:
Hello all.  I'm looking for a T205 NY Giant common, raw or graded, probably in the $20-25 range to go towards another trade.  

A little lower or higher $ may be acceptable too. 

Please e-mail me if you have one available with your asking price including S/H.  

Also, please provide front & back scans if at all possible.  

Thanks!

Donny Muth
